wikipedia_page.main: Keith Anthony Ripley (born 10 October 1954) is an English former professional, who played in the Football League as a full back for Huddersfield Town and Doncaster Rovers.

link_mentions.page: List of Huddersfield Town A.F.C. players

response: * Keith Ripley (footballer, born 1935) (1935–2012), wing half for Leeds, Norwich, Peterborough, Mansfield Town and Doncaster Rovers
* Keith Ripley (footballer, born 1954), full back for Huddersfield Town and Doncaster Rovers
